vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἔννῠχ-ος, ον,
= {ἐννύχιος}, ἄγγελος ἦλθε.. ἔννυχος [Refs 8th c.BC+]: neuter plural as adverb, ἔννυχα λίαν ἀναστάς [NT]: comparative -ώτερον[Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II epithet of Hades, [Refs 5th c.BC+]

while it is still dark, at night
nocturnal, while still dark, Mk. 1:35*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: en la noche ; mucho antes de la luz del día (MAR.1:35)

vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 夜里的, 夜间发生的 (可 1:35)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: còn đêm tối; trời còn tối. ἐν (G1722) + νύξ (G3571)
